channel.title: How the hell...?!?! i cant do this...!
channel.description: I copied RS with discontinuing rares for fun. Now we do have admins which can use ::pickup even though I changed the command to ::pick! Help I don't want anyone spawning items!

item.title: How the hell...?!?! i cant do this...!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

I don’t like that…


if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (newItemID <= 10000 && newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
				}
			}

I deserve 0 credits…

Read full topic

item.title: How the hell...?!?! i cant do this...!
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Change it to this:

if(command.startsWith("pickup")){ sM("HAHA! No more pickup for you!"); }

^^ For Deltascape Source

if(command.startsWith("pickup")){ sendMessage("HAHA! No more pickup for you!"); }

^^ For NON-Deltascape Source

Read full topic

item.title: How the hell...?!?! i cant do this...!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

Make it so only owners can spawn so set the player rights to 3 and make your player rights 3, therefore only allowing yourself to spawn items… Also if you have any further questions, feel free to pm me…
